object.script:
sc,inp,out=screen,input,output freq=16 freqb=freq ptt=false
function hex2rgb(hex) hex = hex:gsub("#","") return {r=tonumber("0x"..hex:sub(1,2)), g=tonumber("0x"..hex:sub(3,4)), b=tonumber("0x"..hex:sub(5,6))} end
function onTick() p = inp.getBool(1) x = inp.getNumber(3) y = inp.getNumber(4) str = inp.getNumber(5) recv = inp.getBool(3) out.setNumber(1,freq) out.setBool(1,ptt)
BGC = hex2rgb(property.getText("Background Color (HEX)")) FGC = hex2rgb(property.getText("Foreground Color (HEX)")) end function onDraw() w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight()
sc.setColor(BGC["r"],BGC["g"],BGC["b"],255) sc.drawClear() sc.setColor(FGC["r"]*0.3,FGC["g"]*0.3,FGC["b"]*0.3,255) if y > 24 then if x < 8 and p then sc.drawRectF(0,25,8,10) if freq > 1 then freq=freqb-1 end elseif x > 8 and x < 16 and p then sc.drawRectF(9,25,8,10) if freq < 88 then freq=freqb+1 end else freqb=freq end if x > 16 and p then sc.drawRectF(16,25,16,8) ptt=true else ptt=false end end if recv then sc.setColor(FGC["r"],FGC["g"],FGC["b"],255) else sc.setColor(FGC["r"]*0.05,FGC["g"]*0.05,FGC["b"]*0.05,255) end sc.drawText(4,10,"INCOM")
sx = 19 sy = -9 sc.setColor(FGC["r"]*0.05,FGC["g"]*0.05,FGC["b"]*0.05,255) if str > 0.8 then sc.setColor(FGC["r"],FGC["g"],FGC["b"],255) end sc.drawRectF(10+sx,10+sy,1,5) if str > 0.65 then sc.setColor(FGC["r"],FGC["g"],FGC["b"],255) end sc.drawRectF(8+sx,11+sy,1,4) if str > 0.35 then sc.setColor(FGC["r"],FGC["g"],FGC["b"],255) end sc.drawRectF(6+sx,12+sy,1,3) if str > 0.1 then sc.setColor(FGC["r"],FGC["g"],FGC["b"],255) end sc.drawRectF(4+sx,13+sy,1,2)
sc.setColor(FGC["r"],FGC["g"],FGC["b"],255) sc.drawLine(0,24,w,24) sc.drawLine(0,7,w,7) sc.drawLine(8,25,8,32) sc.drawLine(16,25,16,32) sc.drawText(2,26,"<") sc.drawText(11,26,">") sc.drawText(18,26,"PTT") sc.drawText(4,17,"CH:"..string.format("%.0f",freq)) sc.drawText(2,1,"SD-C") end

node.label: To Panel Lights
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: From "Activate Station" Key
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

object.script:
units = {}
time = 0 function onTick() time = time + 1 id = input.getNumber(1) isSending = input.getBool(1)
myGpsX = input.getNumber(31) myGpsY = input.getNumber(32)
mapX = input.getNumber(28) mapY = input.getNumber(29) mapZoom = input.getNumber(30)
distanceToMergePoints = input.getNumber(27)
if isSending then units[id] = { posX = input.getNumber(2), posY = input.getNumber(3), battery = input.getNumber(4), beaconTimeBetween = input.getNumber(5), time = time } end
for id, unit in pairs(units) do if time - unit.time > 60 * 20 then -- 20 secs units[id] = nil end end
--calculate possible beacon positions possiblePos = {} for i=1,#units do if units[i] then for ii=i+1,#units do if units[ii] then ret = getPossiblePoints(units[i], units[ii]) for ri,r in pairs(ret) do addPossiblePos(r) end end end end end end
function addPossiblePos(pos) found = false for pi, p in ipairs(possiblePos) do dist = math.sqrt( (p.x - pos.x)^2 + (p.y - pos.y)^2 ) if dist < distanceToMergePoints then found = true table.insert(possiblePos[pi].alts, pos) end end if not found then table.insert(possiblePos, pos) end end
function getPossiblePoints(unitA, unitB) xA = unitA.posX yA = unitA.posY xB = unitB.posX yB = unitB.posY d = math.sqrt( (xA - xB)^2 + (yA - yB)^2 ) rA = timeBetweenToDistance(unitA.beaconTimeBetween) rB = timeBetweenToDistance(unitB.beaconTimeBetween) if (d > rA + rB) or (d == 0 and rA == rB) then -- seperate circles or exactly the same return {} end if d < math.abs(rA - rB) then -- inside each other if rA > rB then return {{x=xB, y=yB, tb=unitB.beaconTimeBetween,typ=false,alts={}}} else return {{x=xA, y=xA, tb=unitA.beaconTimeBetween,typ=false,alts={}}} end end
--otherwise 2 intersections
a = (rA^2 - rB^2 + d^2) / (2*d)
xc = xA + a * (xB - xA) / d yc = yA + a * (yB - yA) / d
h = math.sqrt(rA^2 - a^2)
return { {x=xc + h * (yB - yA) / d, y=yc - h * (xB - xA) / d, tb=0, typ=true,alts={}}, {x=xc - h * (yB - yA) / d, y=yc + h * (xB - xA) / d, tb=0, typ=true,alts={}}, } end
function onDraw() SW = screen.getWidth() SH = screen.getHeight()
screen.setColor(0,255,0) x,y = map.mapToScreen(mapX, mapY, mapZoom, SW, SH, myGpsX, myGpsY) screen.drawRectF(x-2, y-2, 4, 4)
for id, unit in pairs(units) do x,y = map.mapToScreen(mapX, mapY, mapZoom, SW, SH, unit.posX, unit.posY) screen.setColor(255,0,0) screen.drawCircleF(x, y, 3) screen.drawText(x + 5, y - 2, id .. " " .. math.floor(unit.battery * 100) .. "%") --screen.drawText(x + 5, y + 5, math.floor(unit.beaconTimeBetween))
--distance = timeBetweenToDistance(unit.beaconTimeBetween) --screen.setColor(255,0,0,15) --screen.drawCircleF(x, y, unzoom(distance)) end
maxCount = 0 for pi, p in pairs(possiblePos) do if (#p.alts + 1) > maxCount then maxCount = #p.alts + 1 end end
screen.setColor(255,255,255) screen.drawText(15,1,"possible positions: " .. #possiblePos)
for pi, p in pairs(possiblePos) do
ax,ay = getAveragePos(p) x,y = map.mapToScreen(mapX, mapY, mapZoom, SW, SH, ax, ay)
if p.typ then screen.setColor(120, 0, 120, (#p.alts+1) / maxCount * 255) screen.drawCircleF(x, y, 3) screen.drawText(x+4,y-2,(#p.alts+1)) else screen.setColor(0,255,120, (#p.alts+1) / maxCount * 50) screen.drawCircleF(x, y, unzoom(timeBetweenToDistance(p.tb))) end end end
function getAveragePos(pos) count = 1 sumX = pos.x sumY = pos.y for ai, a in ipairs(pos.alts) do sumX = sumX + a.x sumY = sumY + a.y count = count + 1 end
return sumX/count, sumY/count end
function timeBetweenToDistance(t) return t*48.5 end
function unzoom(val) x1,y2 = map.mapToScreen(0, 0, mapZoom, SW, SH, 0, 0) x2,y2 = map.mapToScreen(0, 0, mapZoom, SW, SH, 0 + val, 0) return x2 - x1 end

ids = {}
function reset(id) ids[id] = { inUse = false, lastSeen = -1, registered = -1, tempId = -1, tempUsed = false } end
for i=1,60 do reset(i) end
selectedId = 1 time = 0 function onTick() time = time + 1 tempId = input.getNumber(1) isSending = input.getBool(1)
dataSenderId = input.getNumber(2) dataIsSending = input.getBool(2)
registerIdsThatSentAlready = input.getBool(31) passiveListenMode = input.getBool(32)
-- update last seen if dataIsSending and dataSenderId >= 1 and dataSenderId <= 60 then if ids[dataSenderId].inUse then ids[dataSenderId].lastSeen = time elseif registerIdsThatSentAlready then register(dataSenderId, dataSenderId, true) end end
-- check if was not seen for a while for id, v in pairs(ids) do if (time - v.lastSeen) > (60 * 20) then reset(id) end end
-- cycle through all ids selectedId = selectedId + 1 if selectedId > 60 then selectedId = 1 end
output.setNumber(32, selectedId)
-- if the selected has a registered tempId, also send that tempId output.setNumber(31, 0) for id, v in pairs(ids) do if selectedId == id and v.inUse and not v.tempUsed then output.setNumber(31, v.tempId) v.tempUsed = true break end end
-- if someone with a tempId wants an id, check if he alrady has an id, if not, give him one, if one is available. if not passiveListenMode and isSending then for id, v in pairs(ids) do if not v.inUse then register(id, tempId, false) return end end end end
function register(id, tempId, tempUsed) ids[id].inUse = true ids[id].registered = time ids[id].lastSeen = time ids[id].tempId = tempId ids[id].tempUsed = tempUsed end
function onDraw() screen.setColor(80,80,80) SW = screen.getWidth()
for i=1,6 do screen.setColor(30,30,30) screen.drawText(2,(i-1) * 10 + 8, (i-1)*10) end
c = 1
totalIdsInUse = 0 for id, v in pairs(ids) do if v.inUse then totalIdsInUse = totalIdsInUse + 1 if (time - v.lastSeen) > (60 * 10) then screen.setColor(255,255,0) else screen.setColor(0,255,0) end else screen.setColor(30,30,30) end screen.drawRectF(14 + (c-1) % 10 * 5, math.floor((c-1) / 10) * 10 + 9, 4, 4) c = c + 1 end
if totalIdsInUse == 60 then screen.setColor(120,0,0) screen.drawText(3, 1, "All") screen.drawText(20, 1, "I") screen.drawText(23, 1, "DS") screen.drawText(35, 1, "i") screen.drawText(38, 1, "n") screen.drawText(46, 1, "use") else screen.setColor(0,120,0) screen.drawText(7, 1, string.format("%02.0f", totalIdsInUse)) screen.drawText(18, 1, "I") screen.drawText(21, 1, "DS") screen.drawText(32, 1, "i") screen.drawText(35, 1, "n") screen.drawText(42, 1, "use") end end

zoom = 10 icWi = 7 scWi = 0 scHe = 0
tmp = false tmpX = 0 tmpY = 0
step = 180/(zoom/2)
function onTick() remoteX = input.getNumber(1) remoteY = input.getNumber(2)
isC = input.getBool(3) cX = input.getNumber(3) cY = input.getNumber(4)
if isC then if iPiR(cX, cY, 0, scHe/2-10, 10, 20) then doLeft = true if not tmp then doTmp() else tmpX = tmpX - step end elseif iPiR(cX, cY, scWi-10, scHe/2-10, 10, 20) then doRight = true if not tmp then doTmp() else tmpX = tmpX + step end elseif iPiR(cX, cY, scWi/2-10, 0, 20, 10) then doUp = true if not tmp then doTmp() else tmpY = tmpY + step end elseif iPiR(cX, cY, scWi/2-10, scHe-10, 20, 10) then doDown = true if not tmp then doTmp() else tmpY = tmpY - step end elseif iPiR(cX, cY, 0, 0, 11, 11) then if tmp then endTmp() end elseif iPiR(cX, cY, 0, scHe-10, 10, 10) then zoom = zoom - 0.07 elseif iPiR(cX, cY, 10, scHe-10, 10, 10) then zoom = zoom + 0.07 else stop() end else stop() end if zoom < 0.1 then zoom = 0.1 end if zoom > 50 then zoom = 50 end
if tmp then output.setNumber(1, tmpX) output.setNumber(2, tmpY) else output.setNumber(1, remoteX) output.setNumber(2, remoteY) end output.setNumber(3, zoom) end
F = false function stop() doLeft = F doRight = F doUp = F doDown = F end
function doTmp() tmp = true
tmpX = remoteX tmpY = remoteY end
function endTmp() tmp = false tmpX = 0 tmpY = 0 end
function onDraw() X = 0 Y = 0 if tmp then X = tmpX Y = tmpY else X = remoteX Y = remoteY end
screen.drawMap(X, Y, zoom) screen.setMapColorOcean(10,10,15) screen.setMapColorShallows(15,15,20) screen.setMapColorLand(60,60,60) screen.setMapColorGrass(40,60,40) screen.setMapColorSand(55,55,50) screen.setMapColorSnow(80,80,80)
if tmp then setClr(0, 120, 0) screen.drawRectF(0,0,10,10) setClr(120, 120, 120) screen.drawText(3,3,"X")
end
scHe = screen.getHeight() scWi = screen.getWidth() --min = math.min(scHe, scWi) --icWi = min/10 --rX, rY = map.mapToScreen(X, Y, zoom, scWi, scHe, remoteX, remoteY) --setClr(255, 0, 0) --screen.drawRectF(rX-icWi/2, rY-icWi/2, icWi/2, icWi/2)
if doLeft then setClr(0, 120, 0) else setClr(0, 60, 0) end screen.drawTriangleF(0, scHe/2, 6, scHe/2-6, 6, scHe/2+6)
if doRight then setClr(0, 120, 0) else setClr(0, 60, 0) end screen.drawTriangleF(scWi, scHe/2, scWi-6, scHe/2-6, scWi-6, scHe/2+6)
if doUp then setClr(0, 120, 0) else setClr(0, 60, 0) end screen.drawTriangleF(scWi/2, 0, scWi/2-6, 6, scWi/2+6, 6)
if doDown then setClr(0, 120, 0) else setClr(0, 60, 0) end screen.drawTriangleF(scWi/2, scHe, scWi/2-6, scHe-6, scWi/2+6, scHe-6)
screen.setColor(0,0,0,150) screen.drawRectF(0,scHe-10,20,10) setClr(0, 120, 0) screen.drawText(4,scHe-8,"+") screen.drawText(13,scHe-8,"-") end
function setClr(r,g,b) screen.setColor(r,g,b) end
function iPiR(x, y, reX, reY, reW, reH) return x > reX and y > reY and x < reX+reW and y < reY+reH end

node.label: From Beacon Locator
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: To Monitor
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: To Indicator
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

object.script:
wasEmit = false emitLength = 0 notEmitLength = 0
lastEmitLength = 0 lastTicksBetweenSignals = -1
lastValues = {} function onTick() emit = input.getBool(1)
averageLastValues = input.getBool(2)
if emit then emitLength = emitLength + 1 else notEmitLength = notEmitLength + 1 end
if not emit and wasEmit then lastEmitLength = emitLength emitLength = 0 end
if emit and not wasEmit then lastTicksBetweenSignals = notEmitLength + 1 -- +1 b table.insert(lastValues, 1, lastTicksBetweenSignals) while #lastValues > 10 do table.remove(lastValues, 11) end notEmitLength = 0 end
wasEmit = emit
if averageLastValues then total = 0 count = 0 for li, l in ipairs(lastValues) do if l > 0 then total = total + l count = count + 1 end end ticksBtwEmits=(total/count) else ticksBtwEmits=(lastTicksBetweenSignals) end end
function onDraw() S=screen SW = S.getWidth() SH = S.getHeight() screen.setColor(0,120,0) screen.drawText(SW/2-10,3,string.format("%04.0f",math.floor(ticksBtwEmits)))
screen.setColor(120,120,120) screen.drawText(6,10,"t") screen.drawText(9,10,"i") screen.drawText(12,10,"cks") screen.drawText(SW/2-7,17,"btw") screen.drawText(6,24,"em") screen.drawText(15,24,"i") screen.drawText(18,24,"t") screen.drawText(22,24,"s")
end
